meanings.definition: (生物学)板皮類の、関節頸類の
meanings.english_definition: Relating to or belonging to the extinct placoderm order Arthrodiriformes (formerly Arthrodir)

etymology.value: From the taxonomic order name Arthrodiriformes (formerly Arthrodir) + -ous

usage_notes.explanation: This term is primarily used in the context of paleontology and zoology when discussing extinct armored fish.

readability_explanation.text: This word is highly specialized and rarely used outside of academic or technical contexts related to paleontology and the study of extinct fish. Understanding requires familiarity with biological classification and extinct species.
